events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin our review immediately.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on keywords related to software development and engineering skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's profile and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
We conducted the initial phone screening where the candidate discussed their software engineering background and relevant programming experience.
The candidate responded promptly to our screening follow-up, confirming their continued interest in the software developer role.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for next week to evaluate their coding skills and system design knowledge.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong software development capabilities and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations after a successful technical round.
The HR interview was completed and feedback was positive; the candidate aligned well with the company values and policies.
An offer for the software engineer position has been proposed to the candidate, including salary, benefits, and start date details.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer, expressing enthusiasm toward joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer, confirming their commitment to join and start the role as scheduled.
The candidate's onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and initial trainings planned for their first week.
The hiring process is officially closed with the new software engineer fully onboarded and integrated into the development team.
